channel.title: Daily AI & Tech Digest
channel.description: AI-curated daily digest of podcast conversations about artificial intelligence, technology trends, and digital innovation.

item.title: AI Daily — Devin: Infinite Junior Engineers (Sep 09, 2025)
item.description: Cognition’s Devin acts as async “junior engineers” that run parallel PRs, shifting teams from IDE to ticket-driven workflows. Learn practical guardrails, MCP integration, and hiring impacts.

item.title: Daily Organizing Digest — Sep 09, 2025
item.description: Quick, actionable roundup: assemblies, sanctuary defense, anti-displacement tactics, and cultural shifts to build neighborhood power against rising authoritarianism. One action to take today.

item.title: AI & Tech Daily Digest — Sep 10, 2025
item.description: Today: AI-written code tops 50% in some teams, Microsoft’s $17.4B Nebius compute bet, Databricks’ AI revenue surge, Google Gemini momentum, and an OpenAI-backed feature film experiment.

item.title: Daily Digest — Social Movements (Sep 10, 2025)
item.description: Five rapid briefings on assemblies, immigration defense, anti-displacement, abolitionist safety, and debtor power—practical tactics and action steps for organizers and civic leaders.

item.description: Quick briefing: how neighborhood assemblies, immigrant defense, and anti-displacement tactics are building local power against authoritarian encroachments. Practical steps for organizers and civic leaders.

item.title: AI & Tech Digest — Sep 11, 2025: Production-Grade AI
item.description: Today: AI moves from demos to production—MCP write-actions, YouTube dubbing, custom chips, Anthropic settlement, and agents reshaping work. Quick takeaways for builders and leaders.
